docs.lead_paragraph: To cancel an appearance on the "Today" show, a guest must have a very good reason. How about pregnancy and visa problems?

docs.lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic bishop of Richmond, Va., apologized after workers from a Catholic organization helped a teenager in its care have an abortion.

docs.lead_paragraph: This cautionary series, which begins Tuesday on ABC Family, woodenly follows the trials of a 15-year-old named Amy, a good student and dutiful daughter who becomes pregnant the first time she has sex.

headline.seo: ‘The Secret Life of the American Teenager’ Packages Teenage Pregnancy as a Cautionary Tale
headline.main: A Teenage Pregnancy, Packaged as a Prime-Time Cautionary Tale
headline.print_headline: A Teenage Pregnancy, Packaged as a Prime-Time Cautionary Tale

docs.snippet: This cautionary series, which begins Tuesday on ABC Family, woodenly follows the trials of a 15-year-old named Amy, a good student and dutiful daughter who becomes pregnant the first time she has sex.

docs.lead_paragraph: 9 P.M. (13); 10 P.M. (49) HEART OF DARFUR ''Wide Angle'' begins a new season with an examination of what the United Nations secretary general, Ban Ki-moon, has called ''the largest humanitarian crisis in the world.'' Reporting from El Fasher, the capital city of North Darfur in Sudan, this episode ventures into the sprawling Abu Shouk refugee camp and beyond the city borders into the rebel-held areas of Sudan, where violence is reported to be escalating again (above, a group of rebels). The episode ends with a discussion between Nicholas D. Kristof, an Op-Ed columnist for The New York Times, and Aaron Brown, the series's anchor. 8 P.M. (ABC Family) THE SECRET LIFE OF THE AMERICAN TEENAGER From Brenda Hampton, the creator of ''7th Heaven,'' comes this new series about an ordinary family. Oh yeah, and teenage pregnancy. Shailene Woodley plays Amy, a 15-year-old who finds herself pregnant after a night with the school Romeo at band camp. Molly Ringwald -- has it really been that long? -- plays her mother.
